caribou is the longtime musical project

smith who in the early 2000s also used
to release music under the name manitoba
and more recently under the name Daphne
primarily Dan's music is electronic but
on records such as and/or there is a
strong presence of acoustic
instrumentation or live instrumentation
as well dan may be inspired by stuff
like house but he is equally inspired by
genres such as psychedelic pop however
on more recent releases such as swim as
well as the JA long record he put out
under the Daphne name we see Dan's music
getting more electronic maybe a little
colder a little more introspective but

record he might continue in that
direction but it has been four years
since the last caribou record so who
knows however a fusion of Daphne and
Caribous last record swim is exactly

from this album's lead single dance

beat

it mixed with like a little bit of
